p: The following drugs were used: Carboxymethylcellulose (Formula Brasil ®, Brazil); castor oil (Tayuyna Lab Ltda ®, Brazil); loperamide hydrochloride (2 mg; Janssen Cilag Farmacêutica Ltda ®, Brazil); activated charcoal (Proquímios ®, Brazil); glibenclamide, L-NG-nitroarginine methyl ester (L-NAME), propranolol and yohimbine (Sigma Aldrich ®, Brazil).
